title: Championship Thresh
body: Hey friends, was just wondering is the LCS Championship Thresh skin ever coming back? (Riven too) I assume (and heard rumors) it would be at the end of the next few World Championships, but I'd like to confirm it with an official Riot employee if I could.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Championship Thresh is a legacy skin which means that he'll be available again. 

Championship Riven is a limited skin, which is a bit different - however - Hippalus did [say](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/H004gAPw-ecommerce-qa?comment=00350002), *"Yes I think Championship Riven will come back someday. Most limited edition skins took four years to come back after release, and it's been two years for Riven so far."*
Thank you very much! I think it's going to be hilarious if that skin comes back because some people bought it for like $1,000 haha. @Riot KateyKhaos

Hmmm...

Does this mean players who previously purchased the skin would be refunded and given an icon and splash art edits?
